name: The Necromancer (RaijuStudio)
description:
Game has no audio currently

Game: Resist the waves by raising your followers and challenge the opponents. 

Controls:
Movement - WASD or Left Stick
Camera - Mouse or Right Stick
Interact - E on Keyboard, Triangle or PS4 Controller, or Y on XBOX Controller
Attack - LMB, R1
Dash - Left Shift, or Circle on PS4, X on
